n=input()
i=1
while i<=n:
    st=raw_input()
    st=st+'x'
    l=len(st)
    j=0
    t=0
    p=1
    f=0
    while j<l:
        if (st[j]=='x')|(st[j]=='X'):
            st1=st[t:j]
            t=j+1
            p=p*int(st1)
            if int(st1)==0:
                print "Robot hanged."
                f=1
                break
        j+=1
    if f==0:
        while(p>0):
            x=p%10
            p=p/10
            if x!=0:
                print x
                break
    
    i+=1
